name: Focalboard
description: Focalboard is an open source, multilingual, self-hosted project management tool that's an alternative to Trello, Notion, and Asana.
tagline: Focalboard is an open source, self-hosted alternative to Trello, Notion, and Asana.
author: BigBearTechWorld

before_install.en_us: Before you can use the application, you will need to create a new account when going to the Focalboard UI.
